title: Warm salad of scallops, black pudding and pea and mint purée
ingredients: 2 tbsp light vegetable oil, plus a little extra for brushing
1 black pudding, cut into 1cm/½ in thick slices
2 tbsp fresh mint leaves, roughly chopped
sprigs of fresh mint, to garnish
sherry vinegar, boiled until reduced by half, to garnish
